content.rendered:
Dive Packages

Booking Options

Dive site options for half day and full day trips are chosen by the Divemaster based on the day’s conditions;
including weather, current, and boat traffic; as well as the group’s input.
*Prices does not include gear rental, dock fees or transportation to and from the marina or shore entry location.
*Arrangements can be made to pick you up from various resorts for boat dives.
*Discounts available for large groups and multiple days of diving.

1 Tank Shore Dive

Approximately
1-2 hours

Starting at $60.00

We like to use various shore entry locations that are shallow and easy with none to mild current. Good for confined water training or scuba refresh with a 60 Feet Under private guide.

Contact Us

2 Tank Shore Dive

Approximately
3-4 hours

Starting at $90.00

Enjoy two different shore entry locations that are shallow and easy with none to mild current. Good for confined water training or scuba refresh with a 60 Feet Under private guide.

Contact Us

Half Day Boat Trip

Approximately
5-6 hours

Starting at $115.00

Private boat for yourself or small groups with the option of more than 1 dive guide. Can also join a small operation for 2 tanks in the morning or afternoon with a 60 Feet Under private guide.

Contact Us

Full Day Boat Trip

Approximately
8-10 hours

Starting at $210.00

A private boat for yourself or small groups with the option of more than 1 dive guide. You can also join a small operation in the morning and afternoon with a 60 Feet Under private guide.

Contact Us

Scuba Review + Two Tanks

Approximately
6-7 hours

Starting at $185.00

2 Boat Dives + 1 Shore Dive

Need to refresh your skills? Combine a scuba review in the morning from a shore entry with a 2 tank afternoon dive from a private boat, or small group operation with a 60 Feet Under private guide.

Contact Us

3 Tank Combo Day-Night

Approximately
6-7 hours

Starting at $180.00

2 Boat Dives + 1 Night Dive

You can combine a 2 tank private boat or small group operation with a night dive. Night dive entry can be either from shore, private boat or small group operation with a 60 Feet Under private guide.

Contact Us

Night Dive
Boat Entry

Approximately
1-3 hours

Starting at $105.00

1 Tank Night Dive from a Boat

You can enjoy a 1 tank dive from a private boat or small group operation with a 60 Feet Under private guide. Private boat has multiple time entry options and multiple dive site locations available.

Contact Us

Night Dive
Shore Entry

Approximately
1-2 hours

Starting at $75.00

1 Tank Night Dive from Shore

1 tank dive from shore with a 60 Feet Under private guide. Shore dive is at a  shallow reef with easy entry and exit. This is the best option for easy sightings of octopi and bioluminescence.

Contact Us

60 Feet Under can create a customized diving package with all the options you want! Contact us to learn more!

Customized Diving

Dive the way you want, the time you want, the profile you want. Your experience, safety and comfort are important to us. Let's explore Cozumel together.

Guided Experiences

Our knowledgeable guides will take you on an elite experience through Cozumel's finest sites. Avoid traffic and enjoy your dives to the fullest extent possible.

Dive Training

First timer to old timer? Learn to dive or expand your knowledge. All courses, up to a divemaster level, are taught by experienced Padi instructors.

Island Support

Ask us for help with finding the right accommodation, organizing scooter/car rentals, airport transfers or other activities on the island.

Previous
Next
